name: Crash Club - Drive & Smash City
description:
No races, no rules! Drive anywhere you want in a big coastal city, break everything and take down other drivers for points to rule the leaderboard!

Massively multiplayer action with over 30 players live and real time in every game. Everything can be crashed, with weapons and abilities available right in the middle of the action.

Over 25 unique car makes and countless model varieties, with infinite paint, decal, accessory and emoji options. Manage your garage and sell old rides to make way for better vehicles. Pimp them out with upgrades and powers to define your unique style and get the upper hand!

This is Crash Club - a living, breathing world from Prettygreat to take online mobile multiplayer to new heights!

------------

Crash Club offers a paid VIP subscription option in addition to normal game features and other IAP options. This includes a discount on cars purchased in-game, as well as VIP Flair decoration for driver titles.

The VIP subscription is charged monthly, and renews automatically each month. The monthly subscription is priced at USD$5.99 (or local equivalent). Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off within 24 hours before the end of the current payment period.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s iTunes Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.

Privacy Policy: http://www.prettygreat.com/privacy/
Terms of Service: http://www.prettygreat.com/terms/
